messages.message:
Hey team,
If you need to update your existing sandbox using `UPDATE_DEPLOYMENT` set to `False`, please reach out to <#C01N7DV1137|> or <#C02FSR83JMQ|> before running the job as we might need to upgrade your sandbox's infra to the latest version.
Note: You can safely ignore this step if:
• Running update pipeline with `UPDATE_DEPLOYMENT` set to `True` (default from Admiral) 
• Sandbox was created after 3/8 
• Your EKS cluster is already v1.22 or above
Related runbook (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sCB2PhjyvQVPSdjvTG93jM7kYVvLyIEtKXBS8Hxskoo/edit?usp=sharing) for infra admins
